sense.gloss: remedy for a cold, cold medicine

sdata.j: ↑喉↑↓のど↓が↑痛↑↓いた↓くて、↑熱↑↓ねつ↓があります。|↑風邪↑↓かぜ↓↑薬|↑↓ぐすり↓はありますか。
sdata.e: My throat hurts, and I have a fever. Can I have some cold medicine?

sdata.j: ↑寝↑↓ね↓る↑前↑↓まえ↓に|↑風邪↑↓かぜ↓↑薬|↑↓ぐすり↓を↑3↑↓さん↓↑錠↑↓じょう↓↑飲↑↓の↓んだ。
sdata.e: I took three tablets of a cold medicine before going to bed.
